thread.title: Skiers hit the slopes in snow-covered Paris

title: Skiers hit the slopes in snow-covered Paris
text:
Skiers hit the slopes in snow-covered Paris   00:46 
Heavy snowfall caused traffic chaos in France's capital but delighted skiers who took advantage of the fresh snow outside the Sacre-Coeur cathedral. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
